languages.text: "В общем, сидели мы сидели втроем с капитаном этого "Покаяния", а наши ребята меж тем заводили на мостик кто там живой остался из команды, и одного за другим — фьють в расход. Вон, Косой там был, помнит наверное, да и Близнецы тоже", {n}— Дэгген кивает на кого-то из гостей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "В общем, сидели мы сидели втроем с капитаном этого "Покаяния", а наши ребята меж тем заводили на мостик кто там живой остался из команды, и одного за другим — фьють в расход. Вон, Косой там был, помнит наверное, да и Близнецы тоже", {n}— Дэгген кивает на кого-то из гостей.{/n}

languages.text: "Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В общем, сидели мы сидели втроем с капитаном этого "Покаяния", а наши ребята меж тем заводили на мостик кто там живой остался из команды, и одного за другим — фьють в расход. Вон, Косой там был, помнит наверное, да и Близнецы тоже", {n}— Дэгген кивает на кого-то из гостей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of that Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

"Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of that Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

"Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

"Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

"Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

languages.text: “总之，我们三个当时就坐在那里，我、丹兹，还有忏悔号的舰长。我们的小伙子们把剩下的船员一个个带了过来，我们把他们挨个枪毙了。我敢说‘斗鸡眼’肯定记得这件事情，他当时在场。‘双胞胎’当时也在场。”{n}达根对几个客人点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “总之，我们三个当时就坐在那里，我、丹兹，还有忏悔号的舰长。我们的小伙子们把剩下的船员一个个带了过来，我们把他们挨个枪毙了。我敢说‘斗鸡眼’肯定记得这件事情，他当时在场。‘双胞胎’当时也在场。”{n}达根对几个客人点了点头。{/n}

languages.text: «En fin, ahí estábamos los tres. Denz, el capitán de la Arrepentimiento y yo. Los muchachos nos fueron trayendo a los que quedaban de la tripulación de uno en uno y los fuimos matando. Seguro que el bizco se acuerda, ese día estaba allí. Igual que los gemelos». {n}Daggen asiente en dirección a algunos de los asistentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En fin, ahí estábamos los tres. Denz, el capitán de la Arrepentimiento y yo. Los muchachos nos fueron trayendo a los que quedaban de la tripulación de uno en uno y los fuimos matando. Seguro que el bizco se acuerda, ese día estaba allí. Igual que los gemelos». {n}Daggen asiente en dirección a algunos de los asistentes.{/n}

languages.text: 「で、俺、デンツ、リペンタンスの船長の3人で座った。部下が残った乗組員を一人ひとり連れてきて、ひとりずつ始末したな。そこに座ってるマヌケもその時のことを覚えてるはずだ。そいつもいたし、あそこの双子もその場にいたな」{n}ダゲンは数人の参列者を見てうなずいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「で、俺、デンツ、リペンタンスの船長の3人で座った。部下が残った乗組員を一人ひとり連れてきて、ひとりずつ始末したな。そこに座ってるマヌケもその時のことを覚えてるはずだ。そいつもいたし、あそこの双子もその場にいたな」{n}ダゲンは数人の参列者を見てうなずいた。{/n}

languages.text: "Da saßen wir also zu dritt – ich, Denz und der Captain der Repentanz –, und die Jungs brachten uns die Überlebenden der Crew, einen nach dem anderen – und wir haben sie erledigt. Der Schielende da drüben erinnert sich bestimmt, er war auch dabei, genau wie die Zwillinge." {n}Daggen nickt in Richtung einiger Gäste.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Da saßen wir also zu dritt – ich, Denz und der Captain der Repentanz –, und die Jungs brachten uns die Überlebenden der Crew, einen nach dem anderen – und wir haben sie erledigt. Der Schielende da drüben erinnert sich bestimmt, er war auch dabei, genau wie die Zwillinge." {n}Daggen nickt in Richtung einiger Gäste.{/n}

languages.text: « Donc on était là, tous les trois : Denz, moi, et le capitaine du Repentance. Nos gars nous amenaient le reste de l'équipage un à un et les descendaient chacun leur tour. Cockeye doit s'en souvenir, il était là. Les Jumeaux aussi, » {n}ajoute Daggen en désignant quelques invités d'un signe de tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Donc on était là, tous les trois : Denz, moi, et le capitaine du Repentance. Nos gars nous amenaient le reste de l'équipage un à un et les descendaient chacun leur tour. Cockeye doit s'en souvenir, il était là. Les Jumeaux aussi, » {n}ajoute Daggen en désignant quelques invités d'un signe de tête.{/n}

languages.text: "Neyse işte. Denz, ben ve Tövbe'nin kaptanı, üçümüz oturuyorduk. Bizim elemanlar gemi tayfasından kalanları teker teker önümüze getiriyorlardı, biz de mıhlıyorduk. Şurada duran Şaşıgöz de oradaydı, hatırlıyordur. İkizler de öyle." {n}Daggen, başıyla birkaç misafiri işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyway, the three of us sat there — me, Denz, and the captain of the Repentance — as the boys brought whoever was left of their crew, one by one — and we popped them. I bet Cockeye over there remembers, he was there too, and so were the Twins." {n}Daggen nods at a few of the guests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Neyse, üçümüz oturuyorduk. Denz, ben ve Tövbe'nin kaptanı. Geminin mürettebatından kalanları teker teker önümüze getiriyorlardı, biz de onları patlatıyorduk. Şurada duran Şaşıgöz de oradaydı, hatırlıyordur. İkizler de öyle." {n}Daggen, birkaç misafiri başıyla işaret ediyor.{/n}
